document_data.mainbody:
ormik was the owner of a discreet gambling establishment known as the Prince and Pauper in the city of Iriaebor in the midâ€“14 century DR. He was also the leader of the local thieves guild circa 1367 DR.
He wore elegant clothes and a black velvet eye patch. He had an oily voice. He was quite rotund.
He was known to have a keen memory, which came in handy for things that should not be written down. Cormik had several spies around the city, and he knew exactly what went on in Iriaebor.
He had a taste for fine food and drink.
He was good friends with Caledan Caldorien and with the Fellowship of the Dreaming Dragon.
